Fijian.text: Na cava era daucakava kina na iTaukei na ivakarau ni Fakawela ena gauna ni tawase ni yabaki?

English.text: Why do 'iTaukei' observe the tradition of 'Fakawela' during New Year?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna era dau digitaka kina na turaga na veisolevaki iteitei sa bera na soqo ni vakamau?

English.text: How did the tradition of 'veisolevaki iteitei' become an ideal option when men makes preparations for a Wedding ceremony?

Fijian.text: Sa daucakacakataki vakacava na ivakacavacava vei ira na tamata cakacaka i Viti?

English.text: How is income tax calculated in Fiji?

Fijian.text: Daucaka vakacava na tavioka yaca mena yacova na Bila ni Naila?

English.text: How do 'iTaukei' make 'Bila ni Naila' when scraped cassava is available?

Fijian.text: A yaco vakacava i Viti o Lutunasobasoba?

English.text: How did 'Lutunasobasoba' arrive in Fiji?

Fijian.text: Na cava a digitaki kina na yanuyanu ko Makogai mena qaravi ira na lewe ni vanua tauvi 'leprosy'?

English.text: Why was Makogai Island chosen to accomodate people who had leprosy cases?

Fijian.text: Daucaka vakacava na masi ni Vatulele?

English.text: How is Vatulele tapa made in Fiji?

Fijian.text: Na cava sa daugadrevi mena tauyavutaki na bisinisi lalai i Viti?

English.text: What are the requirements for registering a small business enterprise in Fiji?

Fijian.text: Na cava sa daukilai levu kina na ivakarau ni daukacivi na ura damudamu ena yanuyanu ko Vatulele?

English.text: How did the tradition of calling a red giant prawn become popular in Vatulele Island?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna eso na lewe ni Politiki a sega ni vakaraitaka na nodra itukutuku vakailavo sa bera na veidigidigi ni yabaki 2022?

English.text: Why did some Politicans failed to declare their personal assets prior to 2022 elections?

Fijian.text: Sa vakavuna vakacava na kauwai vei ira na lewe ni koro i Togoru me baleta na ibulubulu ena gauna ni ualevu?

English.text: Why is the people of Togoru village concern for the burial site during high tide?

Fijian.text: Daucakacaka vakacava na veiqaravi ni 'Legal Aid Commission i Viti?

English.text: How does Legal Aid Commission work in Fiji?

Fijian.text: O ira na iTaukei vulagi era dautama yani ena mata ni katuba levu ni vale, na cava na vuna era dauvakamuria na ivakarau ni dautama o ira na iTaukei vulagi?

English.text: What is the reason 'iTaukei' (indigenous villagers) follow 'dautama' (the protocol of entering) when they enter the main door of the house?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna era vinakata kina na Nasi ni veiyanuyanu mera sa lesi i Viti Levu?

English.text: What is the reason the nurses from the outer islands want to be assigned to Viti Levu?

Fijian.text: A yaco vakacava i Viti na matai ni daukaulotu?

English.text: How did the first christian missionaries arrive in Fiji?

Fijian.text: A vakila vakacava na vanua o Viti ena revurevu ni mate na misila ena yabaki 1875?

English.text: How severe was the measle outbreak in Fiji in the year 1875?

Fijian.text: Na cava era dautaqomaka kina na Saqa o ira na lewe ni vanua o Naigani?

English.text: Why do the people of Naigani Island protect "Saqa" or trevally fish?

Fijian.text: Daucaka vakacava na ilavo ni Peniseni i Viti?

English.text: How does the Pension fund work in Fiji?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna era dauvakatabui o ira na yalewa bukete mera qoli na tobu ni ika?

English.text: Why was iTaukei pregnant women forbidden to harvest fish during harvesting season?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna era dauvakamuria na ivakarau ni bulubulutaki o ira na matavuvale ni tagane vei ira na matavuvale ni yalewa?

English.text: Why do the iTaukei husband and the family would follow the custom of "bulubulutaki" for the wife and the family?

Fijian.text: Na cava a biuta kina na yanuyanu o Naigani ko 'Buisavulu'?

English.text: Why did 'Buisavulu', the iTaukei ancestor, leave Naigani Island?

Fijian.text: A yaco vakacava me kalou ni noda qase iliu ko Degei?

English.text: How did Degei become a God of the ancestors?

Fijian.text: A rawata vakacava na veitikina i Vitilevu ko Tui Botinibua?

English.text: How did 'Tui Botinibua' conquer the interior parts of Viti Levu?

Fijian.text: Na cava era dauvakayagataka kina na iTaukei na malanivosa "Dui Mate Ga Na Nona Ucu Ni Vatu" ena gauna mera vakarau vakayacora na itavi dredre?

English.text: Why do iTaukei use the phrase "Dui Mate Ga Na Nona Ucu Ni Vatu" when they have to accomplish a difficult task?

Fijian.text: Era daucakava vakacava na iTaukei na 'Qalu se Vakalolo'?

English.text: How do iTaukei make 'Qalu or Vakalolo' (Fijian dessert)?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna keda daucakava ka kania na lovo e na gauna e daucaka kina e so na mataqali oga me vaka na siga ni sucu, na vakamau kei na somate?

English.text: Why do we normally make and eat lovo during special occasions such as birthdays, weddings and funerals?

Fijian.text: Iko daucakava vakacava na lovo?

English.text: How do you prepare 'lovo'?

Fijian.text: Sa bera ni daucaka na vakawati, na cava na vuna era dauvakaraitaka kina na kamunaga o ira na wekai tagane kivei yalewa kei na nona matavuvale?

English.text: Before the wedding takes place, what is the reason why the groom's side presents a whale tooth or teeth to the bride and her family?

Fijian.text: E vu beka vakacava na isolisoli ka soli vei ira na lewe ni vanua o Beqa nira dautara na kama?

English.text: How did the people of Beqa receive the ability of healing burns? (refers to the healing abilities of people called Vu in the past)

Fijian.text: Na cava soti na ka me vakarautaki yani kevaka ko via taura na veivuke vaka ilavo mai vua na matanitu me baleta na tiko vakalolovira?

English.text: What are the requirements for cash assistance for the underprivileged from the government?

Fijian.text: E rawa beka li ni tautauvata na i balebale ni mata tamata o ya na kai Viti kei ira na iTaukei?

English.text: Do the terms "Fijian" (kai Viti) and "iTaukei" refer to the same ethnic group?

Fijian.text: Ni dua na lewe ni vanua daulesutale ki na nona vale ni sa buto na bogi, na cava e kilikili kina mo virika vakayawa sara na vatu sabera ni ko na curu taumada ki na nomu loma ni vale?

English.text: When a person walks home late at night, why is it said that they should throw a stone as far as they can before entering their house?

Fijian.text: O cei ko Ratu Sukuna?

English.text: Who was Ratu Sukuna?

Fijian.text: O iko na cakava vakacava na kakana ka daukilai kina nida kai Viti o ya na rourou vakautona?

English.text: How would you make the Fijian delicacy of 'rourou vakautona' that is unique to your Fijian culture?

Fijian.text: Sa dau kauta maivei na noda matanitu na ivurevure vakailavo ki na noda vanua me rawa ni vakavuna kina na tiko sautu?

English.text: Where does our government bring in financial resources to our country to promote prosperity (show signs of stabilization)?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna e sega ni vakatarai mera vakaisala o ira na turaga ka mera vakatabui o ira na marama mera vakatarusese ena loma ni dua na koro vakaviti?

English.text: Why are men not allowed to wear hats and women forbidden from wearing pants or shorts in a Fijian village?

Fijian.text: Na cava beka e a buli kina na i vakatakarakara kei Ratu Sukuna?

English.text: Why was the statue of Ratu Sukuna created?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna sa rui mareqeti kina na tabua?

English.text: Why is the whale's tooth so highly valued?

Fijian.text: Na gauna vakacava era dau daramaka kina na isulu-vaka-taga o ira na turaga?

English.text: When does men wear 'isulu-vaka-taga'?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna e daukune ga iVanua Levu na tagimoucia ka sega ni daukune ena veiyanuyanu tale e iViti?

English.text: What is the reason that the Tagimoucia plant is only found on Vanua Levu and not on the other islands of Fiji?

Fijian.text: Na cava sara mada era daumarautaka na iTaukei na nona sa koti na drauniuluna na gonelailai iTaukei e na matai ni gauna?

English.text: Why do the iTaukei celebrate the first hair cut of an iTaukei child?

Fijian.text: Sa dau vakayacori vakacava na butu vatu katakata?

English.text: How is a fire walking ceremony performed?

Fijian.text: Na cava na ibalebale ni ivakatakilakila ka tabaki toka na noda kuila ni matanitu?

English.text: What do the images shown by the nation's flag represent?

Fijian.text: Ni sucu na gone ulumatua iTaukei, na cava na vuna dauvakayacani kina na gone vei ira na wekana na tama ni gone?

English.text: When the first child of an iTaukei couple is born, why do the child has to be named after someone from the father's side of the family?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna a tokitaki kina na koroturaga mai Levuka ki Suva?

English.text: Why was the capital city moved from Levuka to Suva?

Fijian.text: O cei ko Ratu 'Sir' Kamisese Mara?

English.text: Who is 'Ratu' Sir Kamisese Mara?

Fijian.text: Era kauta maivei na noda timi ni rakavi lewe yavitu mena yaca ni timi na 'Flying Fijians'?

English.text: How did the nation's rugby sevens team get their name of the Flying Fijians?

Fijian.text: Na cava daucaka na gauna era daucuruma na koro Vaka Viti ko ira na Vulagi?

English.text: What are the Fijian customs that are performed when a visitor(s) enters the village?

Fijian.text: Iko matanataka vakacava na meke?

English.text: How would you perform the 'meke'?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna era tauyavutaka na PAP (People Alliance Party), ko ira na lewe taumada ni SDLP (Soqosoqo Duavata Ni Lewe Ni Vanua Party)?

English.text: What is the reason the former members of SDLP (Soqosoqo Duavata Ni Lewe Ni Vanua Party) formed the PAP (People Alliance Party)?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna dauvakatabui kina na iqoliqoli na gauna sa mate kina na Turaga Bale, ka cava na kena balavu ni vakatatabu?

English.text: Why do the villagers disallow fishing in their waters and for how long when a chief of a certain village dies?

Fijian.text: Iko cakava vakacava na saparaki?

English.text: How do you make 'saparaki'?

Fijian.text: Iko cakava vakacava na qalu?

English.text: How do you make 'qalu'?

Fijian.text: Iko cakava vakacava na vakasakera?

English.text: How do you make 'vakasakera' ?

Fijian.text: Iko cakava vakacava na kai vakasoso?

English.text: How do you make 'Kai vakasoso' ?

Fijian.text: Na cava beka meu cakava mena rawa kina na card ni basi ni nodra na malumalumu?

English.text: How What do I need to do in order to create obtain a bus card for the elderly?

Fijian.text: Na caka beka vakacava me dua noqu laiseni ni draiva?

English.text: How do I go about making a drivers license?

Fijian.text: Na cava me'u cakava mena rawa ni'u volia mena dua kina na noqu tiki ni qele?

English.text: What can I do to be able to buy a piece of land?

Fijian.text: Na cava na bibi ni vaqiqi moli?

English.text: What is the significance of "vaqiqi moli" or the rolling of oranges?

Fijian.text: Na cava daudiriki kina na tabua vua (dua) na marama, ka sa mate na watina?

English.text: Why do they return the whales tooth to the woman's family, when the husband dies?

Fijian.text: Daucaka vakacava na veiduguci ena bula vaka itaukei?

English.text: How do the iTaukei conduct an official engagement?

Fijian.text: Na cava e daucaka vei ira na cauravou ena gauna ni curu ibure?

English.text: What traditions are observed during the circumsion of Fijian boys?

Fijian.text: Na cava meu na cakava mena rawa kina ni ciqoma na veivuke ni Social Welfare?

English.text: What should I do to be able to get Social Welfare assistance?

Fijian.text: Na cava daucaka ni sa oti na bogi duanadrau nona leqa na wekada?

English.text: What is usually done 100 nights after the death of a loved one?

Fijian.text: Na cava e a soli kina o Viti Ki Peretania?

English.text: Why was Fiji ceded to Great Britain?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna e sa vakacegui kina na Minisita ni Vuli o Asaeli Radrodro mai na Palimedi?

English.text: Why was the minister of Education, Asaeli Radrodro, dismissed from cabinet?

Fijian.text: Na cava na itukuni me baleta na ura damu ni Vatulele?

English.text: What is the myth behind the red prawns of Vatulele?

Fijian.text: Na cava daucaka ni cara na bulubulu?

English.text: What is typicaly observed during the clearing of burial site?

Fijian.text: Daucaka vakacava na vakatoka yaca?

English.text: How do the iTaukei give a name for the child?

Fijian.text: Na cava na vuna a veisautaki kina na yaca ni mataivalu ni Viti?

English.text: Why was the name of the Fiji army changed?

Fijian.text: O cei o Sitiveni Rabuka?

English.text: Who is Sitiveni Rabuka?

Fijian.text: Na cava na cakacaka ni Tabana Ni Qele Maroroi se na iTaukei Land Trust Board?

English.text: What is the work of the iTaukei Land Trust Board

Fijian.text: O cei o Ratu Ra La?

English.text: Who is Ratu Ra La?

Fijian.text: E A kasa vakacava na waqa na Sinuwasa?

English.text: How did the Sinuwasa get stuck in the sea ?

Fijian.text: Daudigitaki vakacava na Peresitedi kei Viti?

English.text: How is the Fijian president chosen?
